meanings.sent1: She walked forgetfully into the room, unsure of why she was there.
meanings.sent2: He often forgetfully leaves his keys on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: Forgetfully, she put salt instead of sugar in her coffee, making a face at the taste.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked forgetfully, losing track of time with each passing hour.
meanings.sent5: The student stared forgetfully at the blank page, unable to recall the answer.

meanings.sent4: The forgetfully clouds drifted aimlessly across the sky, casting shadows below.
